feature_model.name: Feature-9
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Feature-9 (f_Feature_9) :m 1 (f_1) :o Feature-10 (f_Feature_10) :o Feature-6 (f_Feature_6) :g [1, *] : Feature-12 (f_Feature_12) : Feature-14 (f_Feature_14) : Feature-13 (f_Feature_13) :o Feature-5 (f_Feature_5) :o Feature-8 (f_Feature_8) :o Feature-7 (f_Feature_7) :o Feature-15 (f_Feature_15) :g [1, *] : Feature-4 (f_Feature_4) : Feature-3 (f_Feature_3) : Feature-2 (f_Feature_2)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_Feature_13 or f_Feature_15 constraint_2:~f_Feature_12 or f_Feature_15 constraint_3:~f_Feature_2 or f_Feature_5 constraint_4:~f_Feature_3 or f_Feature_5
